thread.section_title: Dracakis Jewellers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dracakis Jewellers | dracakis.com.au
thread.title: Lindsay Bridges
thread.title_full: Dracakis Jewellers reviewed by Lindsay Bridges

author: Lindsay Bridges
title: Lindsay Bridges
text: I was in contact with Peter and he remembered me from at least 10 years ago which made me feel very comfortable. The rings were resized in a week, on time and feel fantastic. I would recommend Dracakis Jewellers any day as they are friendly and very experienced in their field.
